vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μαθουσάλα (WH, -αλά), ὁ (Heb. מְתוּשֶׁלַח),
Methuselah: Luk.3:37.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.21;
son of: Enoch (H2585H);
father of: Lamech (H3929H)
§ Methuselah
Methuselah, "man of the javelin"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪土撒拉
1) 以諾的兒子, 諾亞的祖父, 活到969歲, 比任何人還長壽 (路 3:37)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛土撒拉
1) 以诺的儿子, 诺亚的祖父, 活到969岁, 比任何人还长寿 (路 3:37)
